Container.Name: UniFi-Poller
Container.Overview:
Collect ALL UniFi Controller, Device and Client Data - Export to InfluxDB or Prometheus. Visualize with Grafana using included dashboards!
This template works with poller versions 1.6.2+
READ THE INSTRUCTIONS! https://github.com/davidnewhall/unifi-poller/wiki/Installation
Container.Description:
Collect ALL UniFi Controller, Device and Client Data - Export to InfluxDB or Prometheus. Visualize with Grafana using included dashboards!
This template works with poller versions 1.6.2+
READ THE INSTRUCTIONS! https://github.com/davidnewhall/unifi-poller/wiki/Installation

Config.Name: Poller Mode
Config.Description: Container Variable: UP_MODE - Options: influx, prometheus, both

Config.Name: InfluxDB User
Config.Description: Container Variable: UP_INFLUX_USER - Username for InfluxDB.

Config.Name: InfluxDB URL
Config.Description: Container Variable: UP_INFLUX_URL - URL for InfluxDB. Not important if using Prometheus only.

Config.Name: InfluxDB Database
Config.Description: Container Variable: UP_INFLUX_DB - InfluxDB database name. Create this first with: CREATE DATABASE unifi

Config.Name: UniFi User
Config.Description: Container Variable: UP_UNIFI_USER - Username for UniFi Controller.

Config.Name: UniFi Password
Config.Description: Container Variable: UP_UNIFI_PASS - Password for UniFi Controller.

Config.Name: UniFi URL
Config.Description: Container Variable: UP_UNIFI_URL - URL for UnFi controller.

Config.Name: Debug Mode
Config.Description: Container Variable: UP_DEBUG - Includes more log out.

Config.Name: Polling Interval
Config.Description: Container Variable: UP_POLLING_INTERVAL - Interval in Golang time format to store metrics in InfluxDB. ie. 30s, 1m, 1m30s

Config.Name: InfluxDB Password
Config.Description: Container Variable: UP_INFLUX_PASS - Password for InflluxDB (if required)

Config.Name: HTTP Listen Address
Config.Description: Container Value: UP_HTTP_LISTEN - Web port poller listens while in prometheus (or both) MODE. Must be in 0.0.0.0:port format.

Config.Name: Poll Sites
Config.Description: Container Variable: UP_SITES - List of sites to poll on controller, comma separated. Use cryptic ID values here.

Config.Name: HTTP Port
Config.Description: This needs to match UP_HTTP_LISTEN - this is the port prometheus connects to to pick up metrics.

Config.Name: Save IDS
Config.Description: Container Variable: UP_SAVE_IDS - Save intrusion detection data in InfluxDB. This data does not contain graphable metrics.

Config.Name: Save Sites
Config.Description: Container Value: UP_SAVE_SITES - Disable this to save space and resources in InfluxBD. This data powers the Network Sites dashboard.

Config.Name: UniFi Re-authenticate
Config.Description: Container Variable: UP_REAUTHENTICATE - This is a debug method. Do not enable unless instructed to do so.

Config.Name: UniFi Verify SSL
Config.Description: Container Variable: UP_VERIFY_SSL - Enable this if you have a valid SSL cert on your controller.

Config.Name: Quiet mode
Config.Description: Container Variable: UP_QUIET - Disables most log output.
